keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 19, 2021, from Allison Stoddart of the law firm WilmerHale.
The subject matter is the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, docket number 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
The communication indicates ongoing legal proceedings or filings related to Ghislaine Maxwell's prosecution.
